source:
spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.absence_all (
   
   
   StaffNumber              STRING,
	AbsType                 STRING,
	SicknessGroup           STRING,
	StartDate               DATE ,
	EndDate                 DATE ,
	AttendanceorAbsenceType STRING,
	Days                    double,
	Hrs                     double,
	Start                   date,
	Endtime                 date,
	Caldays                 double ,
	WorkScheduleRule        STRING ,
	Wkhrs                   double ,
	HrsDay                  double ,
	WkDys                   double ,
	AnnuaLeaveStart         date

    )
USING DELTA

%%sql

delete from  odw_harmonised_db.absence_all ;


INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
(   
StaffNumber,            
AbsType,                
SicknessGroup,          
StartDate,              
EndDate,                
AttendanceorAbsenceType,
Days,                   
Hrs,                    
Start,                  
Endtime,                
Caldays,                
WorkScheduleRule,       
Wkhrs,                  
HrsDay,                 
WkDys,                  
AnnuaLeaveStart      
  )

SELECT  StaffNumber
      ,coalesce(AbsType,'')
      ,coalesce(SicknessGroup,'')
      ,cast(StartDate as date)
      ,cast(EndDate as date)
      ,AttendanceorAbsenceType
      ,Days
      ,Hrs
      ,to_date(DATETIME2, case when Start='1899-12-31' Then Start+' 00:00:00.000' Else Start end) Start
      ,to_date(DATETIME2, case when Endtime='1899-12-31' Then Endtime+' 00:00:00.000' Else Start end)  
      ,Caldays
      ,WorkScheduleRule
      ,Wkhrs
      ,HrsDay
      ,WkDys
      ,AnnuaLeaveStart
  FROM odw_standardised_db.hr_absence_monthly;


-----Remove nulls and duplicates from HR Absence Data load
Delete From 
odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
where
	StaffNumber is null
	or StartDate is null
	or EndDate is null;


DELETE DUP
FROM
(
 SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY StaffNumber, StartDate
							ORDER BY StaffNumber, StartDate)
							AS Val, *
 FROM odw_harmonised_db.absence_all
) DUP
WHERE DUP.Val > 1;
